name: Giant Bomb's 10 Year Launch Window
description:
This is a game made for the GiantRom5 game jam, largely "inspired" by Nanaca Crash, and conceptualized as a game that would let me reused the GB crew sprites originally created for Cart Stacker Pro.

The Numbers Keep Going Up.

  • Pick 1 of 3 shows to run every day, inspired by features from GB history.
  • The person hosting takes a run at producing content
  • Every time they "interact" with a co-host, their popularity rubs off on them, making the popularity of the co-host increase by the host's popularity rating.
  • The further the host gets, the more views the show gets, and the more popular the site gets.
  • If I had time, site popularity would lead to unlocking more shows to run! But with only a week and a day job, just take pleasure in watching the numbers go up! Forever.

UPDATE (KINDA): I HOPE Y'ALL LIKE SEEING GAME DESIGN NOTES LIKE I LIKE SEEING GAME DESIGN NOTES
